title: Validate 'Start Free Trial' CTAs Navigate to /login
description: Ensure all 'Start Free Trial' buttons on the homepage navigate to the /login page in signup mode instead of any payment page.

steps.description: Open homepage on desktop browser
Verify presence of all 'Start Free Trial' CTA buttons
Click each 'Start Free Trial' button one by one
Confirm each button redirects to /login page with signup mode active
Repeat above steps on mobile browser and verify navigation

title: Verify Homepage Has No Direct Flutterwave Payment Links
description: Check the entire homepage to confirm that no direct payment initiation links or buttons targeting Flutterwave payment are present.

steps.description: Open homepage and review all payment-related buttons and links
Confirm absence of any direct Flutterwave payment links or payment form elements on homepage
Test source code/DOM for any hidden or non-visible Flutterwave payment elements
Ensure all pricing cards only show 'FREE TRIAL FIRST' badges and no buy-now payment triggers

title: Dashboard Sidebar Contains Visible and Styled 'Upgrade to Pro' Menu Item
description: Confirm that the dashboard sidebar contains a clearly visible and styled 'Upgrade to Pro' menu item linking to the upgrade page.

steps.description: Log in to dashboard as a trial user
Check dashboard sidebar for presence of 'Upgrade to Pro' menu item
Verify that 'Upgrade to Pro' menu item is styled per the UI guidelines (e.g., using gradient buttons, badges)
Click on 'Upgrade to Pro' menu item
Confirm navigation to /dashboard/upgrade page

title: Upgrade Page Loads Successfully with Correct Pricing and Mobile Responsiveness
description: Validate that the upgrade page loads properly, displays accurate pricing plans with payment options, related FAQs, and guarantee info, and is fully responsive on mobile devices.

steps.description: Navigate to /dashboard/upgrade page on desktop browser
Verify display of pricing plans: Starter ($300) and Pro ($500)
Check presence of pricing comparisons, FAQs, and guarantee information sections
Resize window or use mobile emulation mode to test mobile responsiveness
Confirm all page contents adjust correctly without layout breakage on mobile

title: Payment Links on Upgrade Page Initiate Flutterwave Payment Flow
description: Verify that selecting either pricing plan on the upgrade page correctly initiates the Flutterwave payment process and handles response errors gracefully.

steps.description: On /dashboard/upgrade, select Starter plan and click the payment button
Confirm redirect to Flutterwave payment page with accurate plan details
Cancel payment and verify user returns to upgrade page without error
Repeat payment initiation with Pro plan and complete successful payment
Validate payment confirmation and post-payment redirect to success page
Simulate payment failure or webhook error, verify error message shown to user

title: User Signup and Login Work Without Upfront Payment
description: Verify that new users can sign up and log in using email/password and social login (Google OAuth) without making any payment upfront.

steps.description: Navigate to /login and perform new user signup with valid email and password
Verify signup success and immediate dashboard access without payment prompt
Log out and repeat login using the same credentials
Confirm successful login and dashboard access
Perform signup/login using Google OAuth flow and confirm access similarly
Ensure no payment required during authentication flows

title: Trial Users Access Dashboard AI Features Seamlessly Before Payment
description: Confirm trial users may fully access dashboard features including usage statistics, AI agent testing, and agent management without payment until upgrade point.

steps.description: Log in as a trial user
Check dashboard loads usage statistics and recent call data correctly
Navigate to AI agent management and create a test agent
Verify AI agent configuration and test calls succeed
Ensure no payment prompts or blocks occur during this usage

title: Verify Metrics Tracking for Signup, Dashboard Usage, and Trial-to-Paid Conversion
description: Inspect backend or analytics metrics to confirm increased signups, dashboard activity during trial, and improved trial-to-paid conversion rates since deployment.

steps.description: Access analytics or metrics dashboard with appropriate permissions
Verify increased user signups compared to previous baseline
Confirm dashboard usage data shows active feature engagement by trial users
Check trial-to-paid user conversion rate has improved

title: Support Tickets Related to Free Trial and Payment Confusion Are Zero
description: Ensure customer support logs and ticketing system show no new requests or complaints regarding confusion about free trial presence or payment requirements.

steps.description: Access support ticketing system or CRM
Search for tickets related to free trial confusion or payment issues from recent deployment date
Confirm zero or no increase in such support tickets

title: Application Build Completes Successfully with Updated Routes
description: Make sure application builds and deploys without errors and all updated routes including /login, /dashboard, /dashboard/upgrade load correctly.

steps.description: Run full build process on project code using standard CI scripts
Confirm build completes without errors or warnings related to new routes or code
Deploy application to staging/test environment
Access /login, /dashboard, /dashboard/upgrade, homepage and verify correct loading and routing

title: Navigation Buttons 'Log In' and 'Start Free Trial' Are Distinct and Functional
description: Verify that homepage navigation includes clearly distinct, visible 'Log In' and 'Start Free Trial' buttons, each leading to the correct page and functioning correctly on desktop and mobile.

steps.description: Open homepage on desktop device
Verify both 'Log In' and 'Start Free Trial' buttons are present and visually distinct
Click 'Log In' and verify navigation to /login page (login mode)
Return to homepage and click 'Start Free Trial', verify navigation to /login page (signup mode)
Repeat all above on mobile device or emulator
